page.title: 03HOLIDAY FIRM
page.content: OSL is the largest employer in Hoddesdon and Broxbourne. OSL book holidays for people who want to go abroad. These are mainly sun, sea and sandy holidays. There are two buildings; one built in 1970 and one in 1980. One building consists of ten floors. Broxbourne is the main office of OSL. OSL stands for Owners Services Limited. This is owned by TKM which is part of Rank Travel which is itself part of the Rank Organisation. There are five departments-finance, sales, marketing, aviation, computing and administration. About five hundred people work there. It costs about 7-8 million pounds to run. OSL is open from 8.30am to 5.15pm Monday to Friday. Some people have to wear uniforms which are bllue and white. .
